verses.verse: Blessed <S%H835><s%> is the man <S%H376><s%> that walketh <S%H1980><s%> not in the counsel <S%H6098><s%> of the wicked <S%H7563><s%>, Nor standeth <S%H5975><s%> in the way <S%H1870><s%> of sinners <S%H2400><s%>, Nor sitteth <S%H3427><s%> in the seat <S%H4186><s%> of scoffers <S%H3887><s%>:
But his delight <S%H2656><s%> is in the law <S%H8451><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>; And on his law <S%H8451><s%> doth he meditate <S%H1897><s%> day <S%H3119><s%> and night <S%H3915><s%>.

And he shall be like a tree <S%H6086><s%> planted <S%H8362><s%> by the streams <S%H6388><s%> of water <S%H4325><s%>, That bringeth forth <S%H5414><s%> its fruit <S%H6529><s%> in its season <S%H6256><s%>, Whose leaf <S%H5929><s%> also doth not wither <S%H5034><s%>; And whatsoever he doeth <S%H6213><s%> shall prosper <S%H6743><s%>.
The wicked <S%H7563><s%> are not so <S%H4671><s%>, But are like the chaff which the wind <S%H7307><s%> driveth away <S%H5086><s%>.
Therefore the wicked <S%H7563><s%> shall not stand <S%H6965><s%> in the judgment <S%H4941><s%>, Nor sinners <S%H2400><s%> in the congregation <S%H5712><s%> of the righteous <S%H6662><s%>.
For Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> knoweth <S%H3045><s%> the way <S%H1870><s%> of the righteous <S%H6662><s%>; But the way <S%H1870><s%> of the wicked <S%H7563><s%> shall perish <S%H6><s%>.
